decks.notes: This deck focuses on using a variety of low-cost control spells and card draw to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain tempo while building up resources. Lier, Disciple of the Drowned provides a powerful recursion ability that allows for spell reuse, ensuring a steady stream of options and threats. The deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent by countering key spells, bouncing threats, and setting up game-winning combos. By leveraging cards like High Tide and Candelabra of Tawnos, it can generate massive amounts of mana to cast multiple spells in a single turn, overwhelming the opponent with a flurry of counterspells and disruptive effects. The goal is to control the game until a powerful win condition can be achieved, securing victory through clever play and resource management.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy utilizing powerful creatures and disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Aragorn, King of Gondor, serves as the commander to lead the charge. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel, along with versatile removal spells such as Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt. It also features countermagic like Force of Will and Spell Snare to protect its threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and maximize consistency. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the battlefield to secure victory.

The deck focuses on aggressive strategies with Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander. It includes a mix of equipment cards to boost creatures, protection spells, and disruptive cards to control the board. The deck aims to control the early game with cards like Tangle Wire and Path to Exile, while gradually building up a strong board presence with creatures like Stoneforge Mystic and Mother of Runes. It also has ways to generate card advantage with cards like Sword of Feast and Famine and Skullclamp. The deck can quickly establish dominance on the battlefield and overwhelm opponents with its aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing cards that can deal direct damage to the opponent or remove their creatures efficiently. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury serves as the commander, providing a strong aggressive presence on the battlefield. The deck includes a mix of creatures with powerful abilities and burn spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. It also includes cards like Adeline, Resplendent Cathar and Joshua, Phoenix's Dominant to create additional threats on the battlefield. With a combination of creature aggression and burn spells, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on having a wide range of instant speed removal, counterspells, and disruptive creatures to control the board and protect its commander, Aragorn, King of Gondor. With a mix of efficient threats and interactive spells, the goal is to apply constant pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The deck aims to out-value the opponent by generating card advantage through card draw spells and utilizing versatile creatures that can be a threat on their own or can protect the commander. The strategy revolves around maintaining tempo, controlling the pace of the game, and seizing opportunities to push for lethal damage when the opponent's defenses are down.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and quick damage output using creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Pyroblast, along with aggressive creatures like Magmatic Channeler and Pyrogoyf, the aim is to apply pressure to the opponent early on and close out the game quickly. Magda, the Hoardmaster serves as the commander to provide additional ramp and card advantage. The deck also includes disruption such as Blood Moon and Ruination to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Relic of Progenitus and Grim Lavamancer help to control the opponent's graveyard and board state. With a focus on speed and aggression, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can fully set up their own strategy.

This deck revolves around combining aggressive creatures with powerful utility cards to create a fast-paced and flexible strategy. By utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Utopia Sprawl and Birds of Paradise, as well as efficient tutors like Eladamri's Call and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck can quickly deploy threats and answers as needed. The inclusion of disruptive creatures like Drannith Magistrate and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben helps to slow down opponents while building a board presence. Additionally, the deck includes powerful equipment like Umezawa's Jitte and Sword of Feast and Famine to enhance the effectiveness of its creatures in combat. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents early and maintain control of the board to secure victory.

This aggressive deck utilizes the powerful combination of Yoshimaru and Bruse Tarl to overwhelm opponents with a mix of creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence through creatures like Adeline and Kari Zev, while also having access to removal spells such as Swords to Plowshares and Flame Slash to deal with threats. Additionally, the inclusion of powerful equipment like Skullclamp and Shadowspear allows the deck to further enhance its creatures and maintain card advantage. With a mana base that includes both white and red dual lands, this deck aims to continuously apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure victory in fast-paced games.
